relevant_findings.Neck: Supple, JVP not elevated, no LAD, 1 cm firm, non-mobile mass near base of right SCM muscle
relevant_findings.Lungs: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes, rales, ronchi
relevant_findings.CV: Regular rate and rhythm, normal S1 + S2, no murmurs, rubs, gallops
relevant_findings.Abdomen: Soft, non-tender, non-distended, bowel sounds present, no rebound tenderness or guarding, no organomegaly
relevant_findings.Ext: Warm, well perfused, 2+ pulses, no clubbing, cyanosis or edema

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Patient is lying in bed and appears comfortable. He states that he has been pain-free and has not had any nausea since receiving IV morphine.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Worsening pain and nausea before receiving IV morphine, which resolved post-administration.
